transcript:
Customer: Yu na mujhko dur kar ab to mujhko khud me sama bhakt vatsalay namah shiti kanthay namah kripa mujhpe rakhna meri galtiyo ko karke shama bhakt vatsalay namah shiti kanthay namah kripa mujhpe rakhna meri

Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Haan ji sir

Customer: Haan ji sir ho gaye free aap

Customer: Sir kal le leta hu kal wo kya hai mera patthar aaya hai gaadi aayi hai abhi patthar ki

Executive: Are sir aap time hi nahi nikal pa rahe kitne din ho gaye mai kya bolu aapko

Customer: Kal pakka dunga mai kya hai abhi mere dimag me nahi tha wo gaadi aa rahi hai to wo gaadi aa gayi abhi ab mujhe wo jana hai uske liye patthar crane mangani hai aur utarwana hai wo

Executive: Thik hai sir aap interest hi nahi le rahe ho aap mai kya bolu aapko

Customer: Nahi nahi kal le leta hu mai kal

Customer: Kal kis time me sir mere ko to kuch pakki nahi lag raha aaj bhi aapne do baar time diya mujhe

Customer: Kal mai 10 subere hi le lenge na time se hi le lenge fir

Executive: Chalo kitne baje 10 baje

Customer: Haan kal le lunga sir pakka

Customer: Mera khud ka bhi sir kaam kharab ho raha hai kal akela wo hu mai kaam karne wala kya karu

Executive: Haan dekho aapko delay ho gaya aaj kaam ho jata aapka

Customer: Koi nahi kal le leta hu sir kal

Executive: Thik hai

Customer: Abhi call aaya mujhe udhar nikalna hai uske pass na mere se 10 kilometer hai wo to fir ab wo dikkat ho jayegi usko na

Executive: Thik hai thik hai

Customer: Kal le leta hu sir hai na

Executive: Thik hai thik hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to reschedule the call.

- Customer says stone delivery arrived, needs crane.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to reschedule the call.

- Call scheduled for 10 AM next day.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- reschedule, time, delivery
